What I'm Working On Now

Right now I'm working on an open source task management application, clas.si. It's a project made from years of frustration with the lack of a task management application that really had students in mind.


It's written in Meteor, with support for creating study groups, messaging, and obviously, task management. Go give it a shot and let me know what you think. You can submit a pull request or email me anytime here.

Projects I've worked On
clas.si

The free, convenient, and powerful way to organize your student life.

No more emails, Facebook Messages, GroupMe invites, Trello boards, or Wunderlists. Everything you need in one spot.

clas.si includes easy adding of tasks and classes as well as built in sharing of classes in study groups.

clas.si is open source and built with open source technologies like Meteor and Node.js

What's Happening?

What’s Happening is the best way to stay informed about family friendly events occurring in Columbus, Ohio. Each week a list of events tailored to your interests will be texted to your mobile device. These events will provide opportunities to interact with your community, meet new people, have fun and, most importantly, spend time with your family and friends.

Kabash'd

Ka-bash’d is a natural language, game creation framework with valuable applications in training and learning. Games created in Ka-bash’d allow players to use their own words to control game play. IBM Watson, specifically the Watson Engagement Advisor (WEA), interprets user input as in-game commands. IBM Watson is also available in the traditional question answering context via a gametime companion that provides related data on request. Ka-bash’d includes an extensible API that allows easy creation of game scenarios that each provide unique skill-building opportunities to players.

About Me

I'm a recent graduate from The Ohio State University and currently working as a software engineer. I'm interested in web and mobile technologies specifically with Node.JS and Meteor.

In my free time you can typically find me keeping up to date with my hobbies such as mechanical keyboard collecting, photography, music production, or playing League of Legends.
